verses.name: Job 26:8
verses.text: He bindeth up the waters in his thick clouds; and the cloud is not rent under them.

verses.name: Job 26:9
verses.text: He holdeth back the face of his throne, and spreadeth his cloud upon it.

verses.name: Job 26:10
verses.text: He hath compassed the waters with bounds, until the day and night come to an end.

verses.name: Job 26:11
verses.text: The pillars of heaven tremble and are astonished at his reproof.

verses.name: Job 26:12
verses.text: He divideth the sea with his power, and by his understanding he smiteth through the proud.

verses.name: Job 26:13
verses.text: By his spirit he hath garnished the heavens; his hand hath formed the crooked serpent.
